name: Kristi's Chocolate Lasagna
author: Kristi Poole
ingredients: 36  chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®), crushed to fine crumbs
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
2 (3.9 ounce) packages instant chocolate pudding mix
directions: Mix cookie crumbs and melted butter in a bowl with a fork
Press into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking pan to make the crust
Combine cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy
Fold in 1 1/2 cup whipped topping; spread over crust
Whisk milk and chocolate pudding mixes in a bowl until thickened
Spread remaining whipped topping over chocolate pudding layer
Sprinkle chocolate chips evenly on top
Freeze until set, about 1 hour, or refrigerate for 4 hours
